articles.title: Apple shares rise as sales fall less than feared despite China decline - Financial Times
articles.description: Tech giant announces $110bn in share buybacks and raises quarterly dividend by 4%

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: TikTok gets Tay and Billie back with new UMG content licensing deal - TechCrunch
articles.description: Users on TikTok can once again create music clips using tracks from Universal Music Group's catalog, which features some of the biggest names in music
articles.content: Users on TikTok can once again create music clips using tracks from Universal Music Group’s catalog, which features some of the biggest names in music today: Taylor Swift, Billie Eilish, and Ariana G… [+1921 chars]
